**Setup**
```{r setup}
# Set working directory
library(here)
here()

# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library("dataRetrieval")
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
```

**Load datasets**
*Discharge*
```{r}
# Madison County gauges
### September 2023 - March 2024 (before)
FBR_HotSprings.discharge.before <- readNWISuv(siteNumbers = "03454500",
                                       parameterCd = "00060",
                                       startDate = "2023-09-27", 
                                       endDate = "2024-03-27", 
                                       tz = "America/New_York")
FBR_Marshall.discharge.before <-readNWISuv(siteNumbers = "03453500",
                                       parameterCd = "00060",
                                       startDate = "2023-09-27", 
                                       endDate = "2024-03-27", 
                                       tz = "America/New_York")
### September 2024 - March 2025 (after)

                                       tz = "America/New_York")
```
